data: {"concept_id": "interjection", "concept_name": "Interjections", "set": "Grammar & Punctuation", "type": "extrasyntactic_marker", "definition": "Standalone words/syllables that express emotion, manage turns/attention, or signal stance; outside syntax but govern timing and mood.", "axes": "function|control|placement|register|frequency", "axis_values": "emotion|management|realization|hesitation|silence|expletive | intensity|length|orthography|partner_punct|backchannel|redaction | initial|medial|terminal | plain|elevated | sparse|mouthy", "source_file": "Interjections.md", "source_md5": "ed538a7c22e075ae59ae31daddc58b54", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T20:19:51.814047Z"}

{"concept_id": "interjection", "signal_id": "sig_function_emotion", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "function:emotion", "description": "Pain/joy/disgust/surprise markers (‘Ow!’ ‘Yay!’ ‘Ew.’).", "false_positive_risks": "Temperature set by punctuation/caps.", "detection_hint": "Check role in turn-taking/emotion.", "source_file": "Interjections.md", "source_md5": "ed538a7c22e075ae59ae31daddc58b54", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T20:19:51.814047Z"}

{"concept_id": "interjection", "signal_id": "sig_function_management", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "function:management", "description": "Attention/turn-taking (‘hey’ ‘yo’ ‘psst’ ‘ahem’).", "false_positive_risks": "Mis-cast dialect reads false.", "detection_hint": "Check role in turn-taking/emotion.", "source_file": "Interjections.md", "source_md5": "ed538a7c22e075ae59ae31daddc58b54", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T20:19:51.814047Z"}

{"concept_id": "interjection", "signal_id": "sig_function_realization", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "function:realization", "description": "Shift of knowledge (‘Oh.’ ‘Aha!’ ‘Whoa.’).", "false_positive_risks": "Over/under-punctuating distorts tone.", "detection_hint": "Check role in turn-taking/emotion.", "source_file": "Interjections.md", "source_md5": "ed538a7c22e075ae59ae31daddc58b54", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T20:19:51.814047Z"}

{"concept_id": "interjection", "signal_id": "sig_function_hesitation", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "function:hesitation", "description": "Stall/backchannel (‘uh’ ‘um’ ‘mm-hmm’).", "false_positive_risks": "Spellings map to duration.", "detection_hint": "Check role in turn-taking/emotion.", "source_file": "Interjections.md", "source_md5": "ed538a7c22e075ae59ae31daddc58b54", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T20:19:51.814047Z"}

{"concept_id": "interjection", "signal_id": "sig_function_silence", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "function:silence", "description": "Command hush (‘Shh.’ ‘Hush.’).", "false_positive_risks": "Overuse feels juvenile.", "detection_hint": "Check role in turn-taking/emotion.", "source_file": "Interjections.md", "source_md5": "ed538a7c22e075ae59ae31daddc58b54", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T20:19:51.814047Z"}

{"concept_id": "interjection", "signal_id": "sig_function_expletive", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "function:expletive", "description": "Curses/expletives; tone-heavy, use intentionally.", "false_positive_risks": "Censoring changes tone (‘F—k’ vs ‘Fuck’).", "detection_hint": "Check role in turn-taking/emotion.", "source_file": "Interjections.md", "source_md5": "ed538a7c22e075ae59ae31daddc58b54", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T20:19:51.814047Z"}

{"concept_id": "interjection", "signal_id": "sig_control_intensity", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "control:intensity", "description": "Word choice + punctuation ladder (‘wow.’ → ‘WOW!!!’).", "detection_hint": "Tune for heat and rhythm.", "false_positive_risks": "Overuse, costume voice.", "source_file": "Interjections.md", "source_md5": "ed538a7c22e075ae59ae31daddc58b54", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T20:19:51.814047Z"}

{"concept_id": "interjection", "signal_id": "sig_control_length", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "control:length", "description": "Letter elongation maps to duration (‘No.’ ‘Nooo.’).", "detection_hint": "Tune for heat and rhythm.", "false_positive_risks": "Overuse, costume voice.", "source_file": "Interjections.md", "source_md5": "ed538a7c22e075ae59ae31daddc58b54", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T20:19:51.814047Z"}

{"concept_id": "interjection", "signal_id": "sig_control_orthography", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "control:orthography", "description": "Caps/italics/bold shift stance (‘oh’ vs ‘OH’).", "detection_hint": "Tune for heat and rhythm.", "false_positive_risks": "Overuse, costume voice.", "source_file": "Interjections.md", "source_md5": "ed538a7c22e075ae59ae31daddc58b54", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T20:19:51.814047Z"}

{"concept_id": "interjection", "signal_id": "sig_control_partner_punct", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "control:partner_punct", "description": "Comma/dash/ellipsis change breath (‘Hey, / Hey— / Hey…’).", "detection_hint": "Tune for heat and rhythm.", "false_positive_risks": "Overuse, costume voice.", "source_file": "Interjections.md", "source_md5": "ed538a7c22e075ae59ae31daddc58b54", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T20:19:51.814047Z"}

{"concept_id": "interjection", "signal_id": "sig_control_backchannel", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "control:backchannel", "description": "Coded forms ‘mm-hmm/uh-huh/uh-uh’. Choose correctly.", "detection_hint": "Tune for heat and rhythm.", "false_positive_risks": "Overuse, costume voice.", "source_file": "Interjections.md", "source_md5": "ed538a7c22e075ae59ae31daddc58b54", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T20:19:51.814047Z"}

{"concept_id": "interjection", "signal_id": "sig_control_redaction", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "control:redaction", "description": "Tone filter via censorship (‘S—t.’ near kids).", "detection_hint": "Tune for heat and rhythm.", "false_positive_risks": "Overuse, costume voice.", "source_file": "Interjections.md", "source_md5": "ed538a7c22e075ae59ae31daddc58b54", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T20:19:51.814047Z"}

{"concept_id": "interjection", "error_id": "juvenile_tone", "description": "Too many interjections with no aim.", "fixit": "Trim frequency; raise payload or cut.", "source_file": "Interjections.md", "source_md5": "ed538a7c22e075ae59ae31daddc58b54", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T20:19:51.814047Z"}
